text: Zilla is a Godzilla movie character, introduced in the movie Godzilla (1998), a giant anthropomorphic mutated iguana monster named Zilla about 60 meters high and 90 meters long, attacked New York City in 1998, then in Australia attacked an another seperate species called the second Zilla, in pressly. ==Live-action movies== * Godzilla (1998) * Godzilla: Final Wars (2004) * Godzilla: Battle Royale Fan-film, (2014) == References == ==Other websites== Category:Monster movies Category:Fictional animals * Category:Monsters
title: Zilla (Godzilla character)
